snippet: Ukraine asked the United Nations' highest court on Monday to order Russia to stop funding and equipping pro-Russian separatists, at the start of a hearing where it hopes to prove Moscow is breaking international law....

headline.main: Ukraine Asks U.N. Judges to Order Russia to Stop Aiding Rebels
headline.print_headline: Ukraine Asks U.N. Judges to Order Russia to Stop Aiding Rebels

lead_paragraph: Ukraine asked the United Nations' highest court on Monday to order Russia to stop funding and equipping pro-Russian separatists, at the start of a hearing where it hopes to prove Moscow is breaking international law.
